configuration.name: 维保数据与客户状态
configuration.query: SELECT MONTH(c_warranty_end) c_x,c.c_region3 c_y,COUNT(0) c_value,CONCAT(MONTH(c_warranty_end),'月') c_x_lable, c.c_region3 c_y_lable FROM t_customer c WHERE YEAR(c_warranty_end)=YEAR(NOW()) AND 1=1 GROUP BY c.c_region3,MONTH(c_warranty_end) ORDER BY MONTH(c_warranty_end),c.c_region3
